dmca.title: DCMA violation by simplycellphone.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Philip Liu [mailto:pliu12@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Friday, July 14, 2006 10:03 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DCMA violation by simplycellphone.com
Subject: DCMA violation by simplycellphone.com


I am the owner of www.cellphonenews.net.  Recently, I learned that my
copyright has been violated by a domain hosted by theplanet.com.
Specifically, www.simplycellphone.com has reprinted, without permission
and without attribution, a posting by me in its entirety at:
http://www.simplycellphone.com/index.php/simply-cell-phone/sprints-big-i
mprovement-with-power-vision.htm as well as at www.simplycellphone.com.

 
The original posting on my site is:
http://www.cellphonenews.net/archives/2006/07/sprints_big_improvement_wi
th_power_vision.php .
 
I am hereby giving you notice as provided under the DCMA, as host of
www.simplycellphone.com, to cause this DCMA violation to cease and
desist immediately.  Please acknowledge the actions you have taken or
will take to address this matter immediately. 
 
Sincerely,
Philip Liu
Phone: 917-667-8635
Email: pliu12@gmail.com
